TextBlock.Text: Homely Body: a moon within MagMag's habitable zone. it's defining features are the lake and mountain that are positioned opposide to eachother.
i have a theory, maybe something hit this moon and instead of making a mess and recollecting, it pushed all the mass through the other side, resulting in the mountain.
...so yeah, i think that's all i wanted to say. now how do i stop this thing...
*shuffle* NO! *splash* (gargled) i am going to swear out of sheer rage
